name: Praveen Paruchuri
content: Praveen Paruchuri - IIIT Hyderabad CONTACT Menu Praveen Paruchuri Associate Professor, Ph.D (University of Southern California) Email: praveen.p[at]iiit.ac.in Publications Institute Webpage Personal homepage Research areas Artificial Intelligence, Multi-agent Systems, Game Theory Research Centers/Labs Machine Learning Lab (MLL) enables machines, especially computers to learn from environments and make their own decisions. Awards & Achievements Paper on PredictRV: A prediction based strategy for negotiations with dynamically changing reservation value has been nominated for the best student paper at GDN-2021.
